# default

**Type Property**

The view uses any background style you apply via the view’s background style.

## Declaration

```swift
static var `default`: RealityViewEnvironment { get }
```

## Setting the environment background

- **skybox(_:)**: The view uses a skybox environment as the background.

items.description: The view uses a skybox environment as the background.
